Unknown.translation: Whosoever is visited by a beggar for alms, impressed by his humility, the donor never turns him away disappointed.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs iksy dy pws dIn gRIb iBKwrI iBiKAw mMgx leI AOˆdw hY; qwˆ aus dI ADIngI nUM dyK ky auh Es nUM inrws nhIˆ moiVAw krdw[

lines.gurmukhi: bYTq hY jw kY duAwr Awsw kY ibfwr sÍwn; AMq krunw kY qoir tUik qwih fwir hY [

Unknown.translation: Whosoever has a dog coming to his door after discarding all other alternatives, the master of the house out of clemency serves him with a morsel of food.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijs dy duAwry hornwˆ Awswˆ nUM qÎwg ky ku`qw bYT jwvy EVk nUM dXw kr ky auh tukVw qoV ky Es nUM pw hI idAw krdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: pwien kI pnhI rhq prhrI prI; qwhU kwhU kwij auiT clq smwir hY [

Unknown.translation: A shoe keeps lying unattended and uncared, but when its owner has to go out on some work, he too takes care of it then and uses it.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: pYrwˆ dI ju`qI pry qÎwgI peI rihMdI hY pr iksy kwrj leI au`T ky quridAwˆ hoXwˆ iqs nUM BI sB sMBwl hI lYˆdy hn[

lines.gurmukhi: Cwif AhMkwr Cwr hoie gur mwrg mY; kbhU kY dieAw kY dieAwl pig Dwir hY [434[

Unknown.translation: Similarly, he who ever discards his ego and pride and lives in the refuge of the True Guru in utter humility like the dust of His feet, the clement True Guru will definitely shower His benevolence one day and attach him with His feet (He blesses him with
